website_summaries.verdict: One of the most pleasing scratch maps on the market to look at. Lets you scratch off the area as well as the flag of each country.
pros: Underneath the foil is a beautiful multicolored watercolor design that catches the eye
The flags that adorn the bottom of the map can be easily scratched off to give an easy-to-read key to viewers of the map
cons: Some people were unhappy with the alignment of the countries underneath the foil
Some also complained that the photo made the map appear larger than it is

customer_reviews.title: Amazing map and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! My original order came defected and I immediately went to return it. The following day I received an email from the seller asking how the product was and giving me a chance for a replacement if anything was wrong, I talked to the seller and I was able to get my replacement quickly and without the hassle of returning the one I already had. The map is quite beautiful and fun to use. I do wish it came in a bigger size but overall it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Product was beautiful, came on time and was as expected, however there were a few scratches on the map when it arrived which defeated the purpose of scratching off some of the countries!
customer_reviews.author: Tarrika Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Beware
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Beware, however, it scratches very easily aand the marker used to cover the scratches kinda sucks, lol. I created a frame for it using wood, stain, and paint. Can't wait to scratch off more countries!
customer_reviews.author: MetalGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not Aligned?
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful map and it works fine! But the map on the scratch off gold doesn't quite line up with the actual map underneath. See photo for visual. Maybe I'm asking too much? This is great otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Darkazngel88

customer_reviews.title: This map is absolutely beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This map is absolutely beautiful!!!!!!! Gifted it to my sister who traveled a lot while studying abroad, and she LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: m p

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TRAVEL COMPANION!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous companion to my world travels and wonderful customer service--even before it arrived, I felt truly cared about. What a nice change from many other, less caring companies! I would love to be able to give these gorgeous maps to many of my tumbleweed friends...do you ever do special pricing for multiples? And do you have any suggestions for mounting/hanging the map? I could just use thumbtacks on a bulletin board, but it deserves better than that!
customer_reviews.author: Maia Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful visual of the places you’ve traveled. I can’t wait to frame it!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Product arrived earlier than expected, and was in top notch condition. It’s a perfect size and is a wonderful addition to my wall. Thus far, I have only had the pleasure of scratching off four countries, but I plan to travel and continue to scratch more countries off! If you have someone in your life that is in love with traveling, this is the perfect gift for them.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlee Lim

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a grandson, not because he travels much, but because he collects coins from around the world. He uses this map to scratch off countries from which he has money. He’s thrilled with exposing the colors underneath and is encouraged to collect more coins. For countries with one Currency, like Canada and the Unite States, he is scratching off provinces and states that he has visited. This map is sturdy, well-made, and the little accessory kit is a nice addition. The packaging was crushed when the item arrived but the map itself was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst products I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst products I have ever purchased. This is the first time I have ever had to return a product to Amazon. The pictures make it appear to be a clearly legible map. However, when I got it all the countries are bunched up close together and the map doesn't scratch off cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: Faiz Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in perfect condition... It's so beautiful I wish I could keep it for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Scratch off map does not scratch off
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in late May and rolled it out to straighten. Finally set out to scratch off the states/countries and it's impossible to scratch off! I have to work so hard with the scratching tool that you see scratch marks on the other side of the poster (see pictures). Another reviewer stated that after some time it became difficult to scratch, as if it had "dried out," and I'm wondering if that's what happened to me. This is even more upsetting because it's too late to return or exchange it now.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Check the dimensions of the map.
customer_reviews.text: This map looked nice but I should have checked the dimensions. The pictures make it look huge, especially the ones with the people in it and the one with furniture next to it for reference. It is much smaller than I thought. It even comes with a magnifying glass because you’ll need it if you want to scratch off some of the U.S states and smaller countries around the world. Returning this and continuing my search!
customer_reviews.author: justjini

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for this product. I ordered it back in April. I received it quickly and it was a lot of fun while it lasted. But here I am 4 months later, and I go to scratch off a new state that I visited, and it literally would not scratch. It’s like it had somehow dried out. Very disappointed as now the entire map is not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Flunker911

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be nice to note all the countries I have been to. One problem is, not all countries are listed and some of the scratch-off on others is difficult to get off. An example is, Guam is on there, but you cannot scratch off anything.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Fun map
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I was expecting but still a very fun map. It's a great way to track the places you've been. I would totally skip the eraser they sent as a tool to scratch the map because it doesn't work as expected. Instead I used a coin and it worked perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kim M Carroll

customer_reviews.title: If framing, check the size first!
customer_reviews.text: This was a stunning gift for a friend. It's thin like other posters, easily scratch off paint, and came with a few other extra bits in a really nice strudy box. I will say if you want it to be framed in a store bought frame, check your size before purchasing. I ordered an odd size, and it was in between two standard frame sizes. In the end, it went in a bigger frame with a small gag around the top and bottom.
customer_reviews.author: m.huynh.

customer_reviews.title: For some reason, my product didn't come with any ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, my product didn't come with any of the accessories - just the map and a ripped flyer. Returned it for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product, I missing one of the components. I emailed the company and within just a few hours, I received a reply from the company addressing my situation. Within 48 hours, they had shipped me what I had needed and completely solved my issue, and then some. They ensured I was 100% taken care of. Customer service is this company's top priority and I was able to see that myself with my purchase. Furthermore, this product is exactly what I expected and I am very pleased and will likely purchase more. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND this product (and other products by this company) to ANYONE.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gurley

customer_reviews.title: Hard to scratch and underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissapointed with these. I ended up scratching through the map cause the included eraser did nothing to remove the gold film that was supposed to be easily removed. Now I bought these for a dumb YouTube video I made so it wasn't a total wash and I did get some use out of them If you want to hang this up to show off to your friends, do not buy this cheap version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute paper anniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and beautifully packaged. I got this for my husband for our paper anniversary and I'm excited to scratching off our adventures together. This scratches nicely and I like the pretty colors beneath the gold foil. Also I didn't remember it saying if gave you the scratching tools in the description so that was an extra nice surprise that tied it all together :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely pleased first of all with how the product arrived. I bought it as a gift and it was well packaged to keep the map safe. The map hasn't been used yet, as it is a gift, but just opening it up and looking at it, it looks great. Can't wait to give it to my son for his dorm room as he loves to travel!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised as being poster sized (24 x 32?) but I received an 11x17 map w a magnifying glass. I wanted to use this in my Spanish for Native Speakers class and reveal where my students were from and their ancestors back to their grandparents and have a different poster for next year. I tried contacting the seller to get a refund or exchange but they never responded. I’m really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was nice but its very difficult to scratch off. It comes with a scratch tool that does not work at all. Some states are so small that you can scratch them without scratching out the one right next to it. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat map
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I wanted to find something like this to show all the places we've visited over the years (and the places we intend on visiting in the future) and found this item for a good price. It came in a nice box and looks to be in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what’s given
customer_reviews.text: Packing inside not protective and will get dirt. Accessories given is okay but too expensive because just a more quality paper. Not so satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great Map Daughter Loves
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map for my 15 yr old daughter and she loves it. It is a high quality product printed on thick stock. Customer service is second to none. We had an issue (our fault) and CS worked with us to get it resolved quickly and efficiently. I couldnt be happier THe only con is that my daughter is bugging us to take her to places she hasnt been to so she can scratch them off
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: It came fast and would be a great gift for people who travel a lot
customer_reviews.text: It came fast and would be a great gift for people who travel a lot. The first thing i noticed was it wasn't bulletin board material it was a poster. Overall, i think it has beautiful water color underneath the gold foil. Also it comes with a ruler, a pick, an eraser, and stickers.
customer_reviews.author: kerry

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: I like it ok, but advertising pictures were totally misleading about the size. I found it too expensive for being such a small map. I am sure I checked the size ahead of time, but still got convinced by looking at pictures that made it look larger than similar and cheaper products. Same thing for $10 by other vendors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool idea!
customer_reviews.text: This map is so awesome! I gave it to a coworker as a thank you gift and he LOVES it! It looks as good as the pictures. It comes with tools to scratch off the covering and stickers to put different adventures throughout the world. Very cool! I may get one for my husband too. 😃
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this poster! It's beautiful, and arrived very quickly. I'm planning to get some more for gifts for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Typo on the Map
customer_reviews.text: Map is pretty and functional! One star taken off because it says "Saudia Arabia" instead of "Saudi Arabia" and I bought it for a geography office, so we appreciate accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: An invaluable piece that really puts things into perspective
customer_reviews.text: As someone who dreams of traveling far and wide to experience the diverse landscapes and cultures of our world, this map gave me an idea as to how much further I have before I complete my journey. Thus far, my travels have been confined to North America and East / Southeast Asia, with Iceland and Peru existing as outliers. But this fact did not fully occur to me until I spent time scratching away at the golden foil. In essence, this map is a reminder that the world is an enormous place just waiting to be explored!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Chuang

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color scheme and it came in this little cute package that looks great with the lights I have hanging over my room. The only thing I would say is, the scratch off is a bit off with the underneath layer of the map so just gotta be careful with that with smaller countries like the Dominican Republic, I ended up scratching out that one and Haiti although I've only been to one. Super cute aesthetic though and motivates me to visit so many more places!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Huaman

customer_reviews.title: too thin.
customer_reviews.text: The gap between my expectation and the real product was huge. The seller did not lie at all, but I will never buy it again. Particularly, it is too thin.
customer_reviews.author: customer 111

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Traveler
customer_reviews.text: I really love this poster. the rainbow design under the gold is really pretty and it came with a little tool that makes it easy to scratch off. the paper feels good quality.
customer_reviews.author: CitCatK

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, quality map
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scratch off map. Really pretty and exciting for the family. Would've been great to include some perfect scratching tool, as we went too deep with a penny and messed up a couple of small states, but still looks really beautiful when scratched off correctly. Love that it is family owned.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Molino

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The map was a lot smaller than I imagined. It also brought some extra tools and I’m not sure what to do with them. But it’s still great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her husband love to travel. I bought this as a gift and I know they’ll love it. The box it comes in makes it the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This arrived exactly how it was described! The product is simple and easy to use but still has great quality! There is a rough spot around peninsulas like Florida and Greece but it is really not a problem at all! The senders are really nice, I loved how they included a letter on the inside the box and they also made sure that I got my package which was a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Stuerman

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than the photos in their preview but it’s not bad. It came in a box so no damaged was done to the map. I suggest using a penny for scratching off the map because with the small object they sent with it was very hard to use and felt like it could break the poster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these; one for each of my children, and one for my husband and myself. It’s exactly as describe, and my kids are excited to continuing scratching off places we visit.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Neat presentation and vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. The colors underneath really stand out which is great for some of the smaller countries that are harder to see. The map also does include Antartica which isn't represented in the pictures. Probably not a big deal considering I won't be scratching that one off. Still, I thought this was a nice addition that makes it a more accurate world map.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I love the design and the whole package, including all the small details! My original order came defected and I immediately received an email from the seller asking how the product was, and they sent me a new product quickly and without the hassle of returning the one I already had. Great customer service! The map is beautiful and fun to use. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shir Horovitz

customer_reviews.title: Ice breaker
customer_reviews.text: It help me keep track of place I visit and a great conversation starter
customer_reviews.author: Joness

customer_reviews.title: I love knowing where I’ve been
customer_reviews.text: And the places are so easy to scratch off too! I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Snesrud

customer_reviews.title: Useful and motivational
customer_reviews.text: Already scratching it. Helping us to get motivated even more to travel and see the world especially the part that is at the other side. Looks nice and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mirene Rosas Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to scratch off
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic scratch off world map. Great quality and easy to scratch off. I particularly like that the flags of the world are at the bottom for you to scratch off also. Small enough to fit on your door and big enough to easily see the writing and the barriers to each country.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Loving this map! Such a good price and not wrinkled!
customer_reviews.author: micha

customer_reviews.title: So perfect for deployment
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend just deployed, so I got this to keep track of where he went so that I can follow him and he can always remember this adventure! Planning to frame it for when he gets home. I LOVE this product and highly highly suggest to anyone going through the same thing, it’s fun for me now and will be great for him later.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice quality and beautiful. Some of the places are impossible to scratch off, and it takes a long time to do it. Also, the UK is combined- England and Scotland are not separate which stinks cause I’ve been to one but not the other. Otherwise it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: David Viscusi

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday present for those with wanderlust
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for my best friend. She SCREAMED when she opened it, she was so excited! The packaging and the map itself is beautiful and definitely high-quality. I might purchase one for myself too!
customer_reviews.author: Meighan

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to travel more
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of scratch off maps before I found this one, I loved the fact that country regions are in different colors. And the box and little tools are great, really glad I picked this one!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Calvo

customer_reviews.title: Great map and great service!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this map! I spent far too long looking for a map that I liked both before and after being scratched off. This fit the bill completely. The small flags at the bottom are a great bonus. Even better, they offer excellent (and quick) customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for travelers.
customer_reviews.text: Like this version alot. Coworker was gifted one and she hung in Cube. I fought one for a friend and one to keep.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff4242

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality & Price
customer_reviews.text: Some parts were hard to scratch off but eventually came off with a little more pressure. Scratch-off overlay is slightly off center from image below as other reviews have noted. Also included a strip of Antarctica that does not appear to be pictured in the product's images. Overall, good. I am happy with my purchase. Bought another for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Excelent! I bought it for a gift and it was great! The package is small and super cool! Great product for the price I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Micaela

customer_reviews.title: Nice map but some pieces missing from package
customer_reviews.text: The map itself is nice and the quality seems to be pretty good. 3 stars because my box was missing all of the extra pieces that were supposed to come with it such as: accessories bag, scratch tool, stickers and magnifying glass. UPDATE: Contacted Seller and they have corrected the issue. Very quick response and good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Alex.M

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely packaged and beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packaged and beautiful product. The water color reveal is great. The accessories along with it are quite useful too. One problem that I faced was to unroll it and post it on the wall - the roll was very rigid and the few attempts I made to unroll it left unwanted scratches on places I didn't want. Partly a mistake of my own, but if something could be done to make that process easier, it would be very helpful. But other than that, good job!
customer_reviews.author: Debalin Das

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: You can’t scratch areas off properly. After trying to scratch off one area I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: SBCB

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, only down side they made it a bit to small. Overall very good and interesting of how many countries there actually is and at the bottom it has all the flags
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great gift...or present for yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Came in a nice box all packaged separately inside. Purchased as a Christmas gift and the receiver loves it! Was pleasantly surprised with the quality! I would definitely recommend purchasing! Great for ALL ages!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ainzua

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, beautiful and best value for money
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is soooo good! The box it comes with makes it easy to wrap as a gift. Scratching off the map with the pick that came with it was not difficult at all! And the magnifying ruler helps you see the smaller print better. I will be buying more of these as gifts to family and friends who love to go on adventures like me!
customer_reviews.author: K. Eidem

customer_reviews.title: Scratch Off Map
customer_reviews.text: This map is so beautiful! I'm excited to start plotting my travels!
customer_reviews.author: Jimma Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great product quality, but MUCH smaller than in the photos
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is as good or better than I expected. I was apprehensive at first because of the price. I took the time to read the specs so I was prepared for the small size. The misrepresentation of the photos would be my only complaint, but as long as you know that you’ll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gift Giver

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this item! The map looks exactly like the picture, and it arrived in great condition (no dents, scratches, etc). Can’t wait to start using it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F.

customer_reviews.title: Scratch Off World Map with Flags
customer_reviews.text: The map is still in the original box. This is a gift for my broker and realtor that travel a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Met all our expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my college-bound granddaughter and she loved it! The packaging was in great shape and the gift was right on time. The only thing I forgot was a frame, so I will be looking for one of those. I would certainly recommend this to anyone looking for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product - unscratchable
customer_reviews.text: This was a horrible product!! The only thing that would scratch off was the maps area!
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Minds Unfortunately think alike
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad as a Christmas gift...but unfortunately so did my sister-in-law. Not sure if he is going to use hers, or mine, or both. Great idea for those who travel a lot though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Koons

customer_reviews.title: Map
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift so can’t comment on actual map but I am very happy with the prompt delivery and packaging of the map. I believe it is going to be a real hit with the recipient. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dilou

customer_reviews.title: Great price, beautiful color!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors once you scratch the black off!!! We get so excited every time we come back from a trip and eat to scratch off more of the map.
customer_reviews.author: David Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Looks  good
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging. Item is as described. It is a gift so I haven’t scratched any parts of the map. Will edit review once the poster is used
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey kibler

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome! The map didn’t quite fit the frame that we purchased that matched the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Falecia

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth it! Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: So this Scratch off map is absolutely beautiful and the colors are stunning. It came in on time nicely wrapped in a boxed container It is perfect for a small apartment that doesn't require much space. Totally worth the money and will be buying it for all of my friends that travel a lot ! This would make a really great gift even for someone that you don't really know that well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 16 year old daughter, but I think we are enjoying it just as much. I think it makes her appreciate all of the places that she’s been fortunate enough to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Carroll-Brazeau

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The packaging for this product was top notch and Their customer service was excellent. I bought this product for myself, and ended up buying more for gifts. Very satisfied in all aspects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lines don’t line up...
customer_reviews.text: The lines don’t line up so when I scratch off the states/ countries it is not in line with the map underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Turfan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my world traveling cousin for her birthday. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a really cool gift to give to adventurous people
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this and the person really loves it. It is being framed and used as decoration in apartment. It is a really cool gift to give to adventurous people.
customer_reviews.author: Saran Diakite

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for niece for Xmas to keep up where she goes.
customer_reviews.author: Oreo

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!!!
customer_reviews.text: Different than other scratch maps. The colors are vibrant and fun. Will order another one in White soon.
customer_reviews.author: MSM

customer_reviews.title: Nice reminder how big the world is and to go see it.
customer_reviews.text: Son likes it in his room and makes him want to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Mrmr

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. Scratched off her visits & hung it on her bedroom wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neatly boxed
customer_reviews.text: On time and as described. I bought the item as a gift and can’t wait to my friend’s reaction
customer_reviews.author: Ook

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift, it is awesome. Great look.
customer_reviews.author: flychikie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome idea
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great gift to my boyfriend, he wants to see the world and what better way to keep track.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Piris

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: The map is very pretty and elegant looking. Glad I bought it as a gift and cannot wait to see what it looks while when the person will start to scratch it to reveal the color underneath
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: Cool item. It showed me just how much of the world I still need to see. I will travel more.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel fanatics
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for families that love to travel and who loves to record it. My husband and I are enjoying it. I have it up on my living room wall. Can’t wait to scratch off more places in the years to come!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: the things that the map includes
customer_reviews.text: I thought the material was going to make it more resistant, it would be better so that it lasts longer, the product is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a gift and the person just love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy and clean presentation
customer_reviews.text: I tried another scratch map, but it was hard to be precise and showed the “scratches”. This map was clean and look great. It is now framed and hanging in my office!
customer_reviews.author: pepsi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this product to arrive, it is a gift for my daughter who will be coming home tomorrow from her first solo trip out of the country. It is the perfect size and will be great mounted on a cork board for her to track her travels.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix VanEyll-Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully colours!
customer_reviews.text: To really do this world map justice, invest in getting it mounted so that it really looks amazing. The map is gorgeously coloured and fun to scratch off the places you've been.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Nice map, I went with another option
customer_reviews.text: Map is very pretty. I bought another map though to compare and decided to go against this one, so I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Accurate description. I bought it as a present and my sister loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Corissa

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: This is for a Christmas present, I am sure they will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie Burks

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine in the mail and it’s gorgeous! Exactly what I wanted. And the note from the couple who make this was such a warm touch. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this map for myself and I don’t regret it at all. It is beautiful, the perfect size, and it works just fine. Plus, it comes with a bunch of stickers and other useful tools.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa T

product_meta.title: Scratch Off Map Of The World With States - Easy Off Gold Foil Reveals Stunning Watercolor And Tracks Your Travels - All US States Outlined - 17 X 24 Poster In Gorgeous Gift Box
product_meta.description:
Size:Scratch Off MapYour Next Adventure Is a Scratch Away

Get ready for your next adventure with your new Scratch Off Map!
Be inspired to plan your next vacation with your own Scratch Story interactive map. This deluxe map of the world will help you visualize where you’ve been and where you want to make your next mark. 

Start right away by scratching off the countries you’ve already visited and then plan your next adventure that’s hidden by gold. 

Accessories Included:
Accessories bag
Scratch tool 
Eraser
3 Sticker Sheets 
Magnifying Glass

Our interactive map is intended as a visual, fun decorative item and not as a precise educational tool.
feature_bullets: SCRATCH OFF MAP OF THE WORLD - SCRATCH OFF MAP POSTER - Every adventurer’s number one scratch travel tracking map for your unforgettable memories, this detailed world scratch off map deluxe poster has been carefully designed - capturing even the most remote locations - SCRATCH OFF MAP OF THE WORLD WITH STATES

SCRATCH OFF MAP - Reveal beautiful watercolor countries and united states behind a gold foil layer. Display your world and usa travel story to family and friends and remember the good times with this spectacular 17 x 24 scratch off world map poster. Office Products and Educational Supplies

SCRATCH OFF WORLD MAP POSTER - Additional accessories complete the experience so you can indulge whilst revealing your latest journeys. Scratch out neat borders with a specially designed scratch tool. Also includes: accessories bag, eraser, stickers and magnifying glass

WORLD MAP SCRATCH OFF - Surprise your travel enthusiast friends with this perfectly packaged Map of the World Scratch Off gift from Scratch Story Maps, share travel stories and plan to build new memories as unique as you are

CUSTOMERS ARE OUR #1 PRIORITY - If you haven’t had a 5-star experience with us or your product, we want to do whatever we can to fix that! All our products are tested and loved by us and our top priority is your 100% satisfaction
